abstract: As many dismayed readers would attest, agreement problems are probably our most common grammatical fault - subject and verb, subject and predicate noun, pronoun and antecedent.
snippet: As many dismayed readers would attest, agreement problems are probably our most common grammatical fault - subject and verb, subject and predicate noun, pronoun and antecedent.
lead_paragraph: Notes from the newsroom on grammar, usage and style. (Some frequently asked questions are here.)
